TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegistryAccessRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule
Public NotInheritable Class RegistryAccessRule Inherits AccessRule

summary.span: 表示允許或拒絕使用者或群組的一組存取權限。

span.span: Represents a set of access rights allowed or denied for a user or group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是一組.NET Framework 提供用於管理 Windows 存取控制安全性登錄機碼的類別。The class is one of a set of classes that the .NET Framework provides for managing Windows access control security on registry keys. 如需這些類別和其基礎的 Windows 存取控制結構的關聯性的概觀，請參閱。For an overview of these classes, and their relationship to the underlying Windows access control structures, see . > [!NOTE] > Windows 存取控制安全性只能套用到登錄機碼。Windows access control security can only be applied to registry keys. 它無法套用至個別的索引鍵/值組儲存在索引鍵。It cannot be applied to individual key/value pairs stored in a key. 若要取得目前套用的登錄機碼的規則清單，請使用方法來取得物件，然後再使用其方法，以取得的集合物件。To get a list of the rules currently applied to a registry key, use the method to get a object, and then use its method to obtain a collection of objects. 物件不會對應一對一與基礎判別控制存取清單 (DACL) 中的存取控制項目。 objects do not map one-to-one with access control entries in the underlying discretionary control access list (DACL). 取得登錄機碼中的所有存取規則的集合，集合會包含目前表示所有存取控制項目所需的規則的最小數目。When you get the set of all access rules for a registry key, the set contains the minimum number of rules currently required to express all the access control entries. > [!NOTE] > 當您套用和移除規則，就會變更基礎的存取控制項目。The underlying access control entries change as you apply and remove rules. 規則中的資訊可能的話，合併到維護最小的數字的存取控制項目。The information in rules is merged if possible, to maintain the smallest number of access control entries. 因此，當讀取目前的規則清單時，它看起來可能不完全與您加入的所有規則的清單。Thus, when you read the current list of rules, it might not look exactly like the list of all the rules you have added. 使用物件，指定允許或拒絕使用者或群組的存取權限。Use objects to specify access rights to allow or deny to a user or group. A物件一律代表允許存取或拒絕存取，永遠不會兩者。A object always represents either allowed access or denied access, never both. 若要將規則套用到登錄機碼，使用方法來取得物件。To apply a rule to a registry key, use the method to get the object. 修改物件使用其方法來新增規則，然後使用重新附加安全性物件的方法。Modify the object by using its methods to add the rule, and then use the method to reattach the security object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您所做的變更物件不會影響登錄機碼的存取層級直到您呼叫將登錄機碼變更後的安全性物件的方法。Changes you make to a object do not affect the access levels of the registry key until you call the method to assign the altered security object to the registry key. 物件是不可變的。 objects are immutable. 登錄機碼的安全性會使用的方法進行修改類別來新增或移除規則; 當您這麼做時，會修改基礎的存取控制項目。Security for a registry key is modified using the methods of the class to add or remove rules; as you do this, the underlying access control entries are modified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範繼承和傳播的存取規則。The following code example demonstrates access rules with inheritance and propagation. 此範例會建立物件，然後建立並加入兩個規則，具有旗標。The example creates a object, then creates and adds two rules that have the flag. 第一個規則包含沒有傳播旗標，而第二個則包含和。The first rule has no propagation flags, while the second has and . 程式會顯示在規則物件，然後再使用物件來建立子機碼。The program displays the rules in the object, and then uses the object to create a subkey. 程式會建立子系子機碼和孫系子機碼，並接著會顯示每一個子機碼的安全性。The program creates a child subkey and a grandchild subkey, and then displays the security for each subkey. 最後，程式會刪除測試金鑰。Finally, the program deletes the test keys. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式指定預設傳播和繼承。This constructor specifies default propagation and inheritance. 也就是說，和。That is, and . 這個建構函式相當於建立物件，藉由傳遞`identity`至建構函式，並傳遞新建物件建構函式。This constructor is equivalent to creating an object, by passing `identity` to the constructor, and passing the newly created object to the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立登錄存取規則，並將它們加入至顯示方式的規則，允許和拒絕權限會有所區隔，同時在同一個相容的規則類型的物件，會合併。The following code example creates registry access rules and adds them to a object, showing how rules that allow and deny rights remain separate, while compatible rules of the same kind are merged. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，指定套用此規則的使用者或群組、存取權限、繼承旗標、傳用旗標，以及允許還是拒絕指定的存取權限。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the user or group the rule applies to, the access rights, the inheritance flags, the propagation flags, and whether the specified access rights are allowed or denied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有登錄機碼都是容器，因此唯一有意義的登錄機碼的繼承旗標是旗標。All registry keys are containers, so the only inheritance flag that is meaningful for registry keys is the flag. 如果未指定這個旗標，則忽略傳播旗標，並直接機碼會受到影響。If this flag is not specified, the propagation flags are ignored, and only the immediate key is affected. 如果旗標存在，此規則會傳播下表所示。If the flag is present, the rule is propagated as shown in the following table. 此表格假設沒有子系子機碼 CS 與 GS 孫系子機碼的子機碼 S。The table assumes there is a subkey S with child subkey CS and grandchild subkey GS. 也就是身為下下層子機碼的路徑是 S\CS\GS。That is, the path for the grandchild subkey is S\CS\GS. |傳播旗標Propagation flags|SS|CSCS|GSGS| |-----------------------|-------|--------|--------| ||XX|XX|XX| ||XX|XX|| |||XX|XX| |, , ||XX|| 身為下下層子機碼的模式會控管的孫系子機碼所包含的所有子機碼。The pattern for the grandchild subkey governs all subkeys contained by the grandchild subkey. 例如，如果旗標指定給`inheritanceFlags`和傳播旗標會指定`propagationFlags`，這項規則不適用於直屬子機碼，但未套用至所有子直屬子機碼和所有子機碼它們包含。For example, if the flag is specified for `inheritanceFlags` and the propagation flag is specified for `propagationFlags`, this rule does not apply to the immediate subkey, but does apply to all its immediate child subkeys and to all subkeys they contain. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以指定旗標，以`inheritanceFlags`，在此情況下沒有點。Although you can specify the flag for `inheritanceFlags`, there is no point in doing so. 存取控制項目的子機碼中的名稱/值組不是個別的物件。For the purposes of access control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 名稱/值組的存取權限是由子機碼的權限控制。The access rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，因為所有子機碼是容器 （也就是它們可以包含其他子機碼），它們不會影響旗標。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最後，指定旗標不必要地變得非常複雜的維護的規則，因為它會干擾否則相容的規則組合。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the combination of otherwise compatible rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有登錄機碼都是容器，因此唯一有意義的登錄機碼的繼承旗標是旗標。All registry keys are containers, so the only inheritance flag that is meaningful for registry keys is the flag. 如果未指定這個旗標，則忽略傳播旗標，並直接機碼會受到影響。If this flag is not specified, the propagation flags are ignored, and only the immediate key is affected. 如果旗標存在，此規則會傳播下表所示。If the flag is present, the rule is propagated as shown in the following table. 此表格假設沒有子系子機碼 CS 與 GS 孫系子機碼的子機碼 S。The table assumes there is a subkey S with child subkey CS and grandchild subkey GS. 也就是身為下下層子機碼的路徑是 S\CS\GS。That is, the path for the grandchild subkey is S\CS\GS. |傳播旗標Propagation flags|SS|CSCS|GSGS| |-----------------------|-------|--------|--------| ||XX|XX|XX| ||XX|XX|| |||XX|XX| |, , ||XX|| 身為下下層子機碼的模式會控管的孫系子機碼所包含的所有子機碼。The pattern for the grandchild subkey governs all subkeys contained by the grandchild subkey. 例如，如果旗標指定給`inheritanceFlags`和傳播旗標會指定`propagationFlags`，這項規則不適用於直屬子機碼，但未套用至所有子直屬子機碼和所有子機碼它們包含。For example, if the flag is specified for `inheritanceFlags` and the propagation flag is specified for `propagationFlags`, this rule does not apply to the immediate subkey, but does apply to all its immediate child subkeys and to all subkeys they contain. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以指定旗標，以`inheritanceFlags`，在此情況下沒有點。Although you can specify the flag for `inheritanceFlags`, there is no point in doing so. 存取控制項目的子機碼中的名稱/值組不是個別的物件。For the purposes of access control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 名稱/值組的存取權限是由子機碼的權限控制。The access rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，因為所有子機碼是容器 （也就是它們可以包含其他子機碼），它們不會影響旗標。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最後，指定旗標不必要地變得非常複雜的維護的規則，因為它會干擾否則相容的規則組合。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the combination of otherwise compatible rules. 這個建構函式相當於建立物件，藉由傳遞`identity`至建構函式，並傳遞新建物件建構函式。This constructor is equivalent to creating an object, by passing `identity` to the constructor, and passing the newly created object to the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範繼承和傳播的存取規則。The following code example demonstrates access rules with inheritance and propagation. 此範例會建立物件，然後建立並加入兩個規則，具有旗標。The example creates a object, and then creates and adds two rules that have the flag. 第一個規則包含沒有傳播旗標，而第二個則包含和。The first rule has no propagation flags, while the second has and . 程式會顯示在規則物件，然後使用物件以建立子機碼。The program displays the rules in the object, and then uses the object to create a subkey. 程式會建立子系子機碼和孫系子機碼，並接著會顯示每一個子機碼的規則。The program creates a child subkey and a grandchild subkey, and then displays the rules for each subkey. 最後，程式會刪除測試金鑰。Finally, the program deletes the test keys. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RegistryRights As RegistryRights

summary.span: 取得存取規則所允許或拒絕的權限。

span.span: Gets the rights allowed or denied by the access rule.

value.span: 值的位元組合，表示存取規則所允許或拒絕的權限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values indicating the rights allowed or denied by the access rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件是不可變的。 objects are immutable. 您可以建立新的存取規則，代表不同的使用者、 不同的權限，或不同，但是您不能修改現有的存取規則。You can create a new access rule representing a different user, different rights, or a different , but you cannot modify an existing access rule.
